class.name: Introduction to Shelly University
class.description: This class is designed to introduce you to the Shelly University platform.

class.name: Shelly Plus 1PM UL
class.description: UL-certified Wi-Fi-operated smart relay, 1 channel 15A, with Power Metering

class.name: Shelly Plus H&T
class.description: Next- Generation Wi-Fi Temperature & Humidity sensor

class.name: Shelly Motion 2
class.description: Next-Generation Wi-Fi Motion Sensor with Light Meter and Temperature Sensor

class.name: Shelly Plus Plug
class.description: Shelly Plus Plug US will monitor and control lighting, heating, or any other connected electrical appliance at home

class.name: Contactor Tips
class.description: Contactors are relays for high amperage or multi-wire circuits. They're simple to use and, when paired with a Shelly relay or energy meter, a properly rated contactor allows you to control any electrical circuit.

class.name: 240v Circuits - Two Shelly Pro 3EMs with Contactor Control
class.description: This instruction set shows how to assemble and wire two Shelly Pro 3EM energy meters, with Switch AddOn, and contactors, for use with two 240v circuits. The instruction includes wiring instruction and parts list.

class.name: Shelly Plus 1PM - The Benefits of Office Installations
class.description: This white paper covers the most popular solutions powered by Shelly Plus 1PM for office environments.
